Package io.servicetalk.transport.api

Interface ClientSslConfig

All Superinterfaces:
SslConfig
All Known Implementing Classes:
DelegatingClientSslConfig
public interface ClientSslConfig extends SslConfig
Specifies the configuration for client side TLS/SSL.

    alpnProtocols, certificateCompressionAlgorithms, ciphers, handshakeTimeout, keyCertChainSupplier, keyManagerFactory, keyPassword, keySupplier, maxCertificateListBytes, provider, sessionCacheSize, sessionTimeout, sslProtocols, trustCertChainSupplier, trustManagerFactory

  • Method Details

    • hostnameVerificationAlgorithm

      @Nullable String hostnameVerificationAlgorithm()
      Get the algorithm to use for hostname verification to verify the server identity.
      Returns:
      The algorithm to use when verifying the host name. See Endpoint Identification Algorithm Name.
      See Also:
      • SSLParameters.setEndpointIdentificationAlgorithm(String)

    • peerHost

      @Nullable String peerHost()
      Get the non-authoritative name of the peer.
      Returns:
      the non-authoritative name of the peer, or null if unavailable (which may require disabling hostname verification, and may disable session resumption).
      See Also:
      • SSLEngine.getPeerHost()

    • peerPort

      int peerPort()
      Get the non-authoritative port of the peer.
      Returns:
      the non-authoritative port of the peer, or -1 if unavailable (which may prevent session resumption).
      See Also:
      • SSLEngine.getPeerPort()

    • sniHostname

      @Nullable String sniHostname()
      Get the SNI host name.
      Returns:
      The SNI host name, or null to not enable SNI.
      See Also:
      • SSLParameters.setServerNames(List)
